TextLibrary.Text: Lord Bane
It is time for you to turn back, Human.
It is time for you to turn back, Human.
It is time for you to turn back, Human.
It is time for you to turn back, Human.
Who are you? And what is your business here?
Who are you? And what is your business here?
Who are you? And what is your business here?
Who are you? And what is your business here?
Come now. Surely you know who I am...
Come now. Surely you know who I am...
Come now. Surely you know who I am...
Come now. Surely you know who I am...
Bane...
Bane...
Bane...
Bane...
LORD Bane! Dark Horseman of Death, Master of the Grave. Heed my words - turn back now!
LORD Bane! Dark Horseman of Death, Master of the Grave. Heed my words - turn back now!
LORD Bane! Dark Horseman of Death, Master of the Grave. Heed my words - turn back now!
LORD Bane! Dark Horseman of Death, Master of the Grave. Heed my words - turn back now!
Never! I came here to stop you. I refuse to turn back!
Never! I came here to stop you. I refuse to turn back!
Never! I came here to stop you. I refuse to turn back!
Never! I came here to stop you. I refuse to turn back!
Your ancestors traveled here with an entire army at their back. They are now dust, but I still stand before you. What can one little Human do that an entire army could not?
Your ancestors traveled here with an entire army at their back. They are now dust, but I still stand before you. What can one little Human do that an entire army could not?
Your ancestors traveled here with an entire army at their back. They are now dust, but I still stand before you. What can one little Human do that an entire army could not?
Your ancestors traveled here with an entire army at their back. They are now dust, but I still stand before you. What can one little Human do that an entire army could not?
I will find a way...
I will find a way...
I will find a way...
I will find a way...

You dare to threaten ME! You will PERISH! Utterly! When I have finished with you, your soul will be torn into a thousand pieces and scattered beyond the stars. We will rend your flesh into tatters and vaporize it in the pits of fire beneath my citadel.

You dare to threaten ME! You will PERISH! Utterly! When I have finished with you, your soul will be torn into a thousand pieces and scattered beyond the stars. We will rend your flesh into tatters and vaporize it in the pits of fire beneath my citadel.

You dare to threaten ME! You will PERISH! Utterly! When I have finished with you, your soul will be torn into a thousand pieces and scattered beyond the stars. We will rend your flesh into tatters and vaporize it in the pits of fire beneath my citadel.

You dare to threaten ME! You will PERISH! Utterly! When I have finished with you, your soul will be torn into a thousand pieces and scattered beyond the stars. We will rend your flesh into tatters and vaporize it in the pits of fire beneath my citadel.
I WILL find a way.
I WILL find a way.
I WILL find a way.
I WILL find a way.
Then face my servants. If this Doomknight does not stop you, the blizzard that follows him will bury you all.
Then face my servants. If this Doomknight does not stop you, the blizzard that follows him will bury you all.
Then face my servants. If this Doomknight does not stop you, the blizzard that follows him will bury you all.
Then face my servants. If this Doomknight does not stop you, the blizzard that follows him will bury you all.
